last_episode_to_air.name: June 21st
last_episode_to_air.overview: On the decisive night by the canyons, Ismaël's fate lies in the hands of Léa, who makes a self-sacrificing decision for her loved ones.

name: The 7 Lives of Lea
overview: After finding a young man's remains, Léa wakes up in the 90s and body swaps seven times as she tries to solve the mystery of his death — and prevent it.

episodes.name: June 15th
episodes.overview: First After finding a skeleton while wandering in the canyons, 17-year-old Léa wakes up in 1991, in the body of Ismaël, a young man once close to her parents.episode

episodes.name: June 16th
episodes.overview: While inhabiting a new body, Léa discovers secrets about her parents' past. Back in the present, Léa snoops inside Karine's email inbox.

episodes.name: June 17th
episodes.overview: As the clock ticks, Léa wakes up in Pye's body and makes an attempt to prevent Ismaël's death — with surprising ramifications.

episodes.name: June 18th
episodes.overview: Léa discovers Sandra's secret and tries to fix the past through Pye. Ismaël feels betrayed by Karine. Miriam sheds new light on Ismaël's death.

episodes.name: June 19th
episodes.overview: After waking up as Patricia, Léa forms an unusual connection with Ismaël. Tensions come to a head between Léa and Romane.

episodes.name: June 20th
episodes.overview: Léa searches for the smoking gun. The nature of Stéphane's relationship with Ismaël comes to light. An existential question looms over Léa.

episodes.name: June 21st
episodes.overview: On the decisive night by the canyons, Ismaël's fate lies in the hands of Léa, who makes a self-sacrificing decision for her loved ones.
